file_content.text: Perhaps this alliance is a sign of things to come.
This is the Imperial Guard's training data. It should help both sides.
This will be invaluable. Thank you. And Colonel...?
I won't tell my superiors if you won't. Like it or not, we're in this together.
I appreciate your intervention. I know others would not approve, but our alliance here gives me hope.
Stay focused, Captain. Revanites first, galactic peace later.
The Imperial Guard knew everything about this world. We should be sharing their data, not hiding it.
Listen. One of your sergeants died for me today, holding back a Massassi swarm. I am not opposed to an alliance.
Yet if your people are investigating the Imperial Guard facility, we must know what you find. The topographical data alone....
I like you, Captain. You're a freak, and I'd still help if I could.
But that data on the Guard computers? It's not mine to recover--or to share.
This alliance is too fragile. Yet it could lead to so much.
